entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain or ice pellets beginning early in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 120 along parts of the coast late in the morning and in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
